displayName: RDS Oracle Bring Your Own License - License Required
rationale: Running an Oracle RDS instance without the License Included option requires you to own appropriate Oracle licenses.  Doing so without appropriate Oracle licenses could incur a significant financial liability.
recommended_action: Ensure that you own the appropriate Oracle licenses for your RDS Oracle instances.  If you are confident that the Oracle RDS instances are properly licensed then apply an exception to this problem.  If you are unsure of your Oracle license compliance, please contact your OpsCompass representative.
error_message: RDS Oracle instances that do not use the License Included option require an Oracle Database license
ruleNames: RDS Oracle Bring Your Own License - License Required
